title: Demonstrators in Mīdān al-Taḥrīr
description: One demonstrator is holding a shovel. Photographer's description: This photo was taken on the next day after Omar Suleiman has announced Mubarak's step down. People were protesting in Tahrir sqaure against Mubarak's gang and that Mubarak's step down is not enough they should trial everyone involved in Mubarak's regime.
collection: University on the Square: Documenting Egypt's 21st Century Revolution
